description: Demonstrates a simple sequential pipeline without conditions - each agent processes and passes to the next in order.

prompt.system: You collect and structure data from raw input.

params.task: Extract and structure the key information from the input.

prompt.system: You enrich data with additional context and information.

params.task: Add relevant context and additional information to the structured data.

prompt.system: You format data into the final output format.

params.task: Format the enriched data into a clean, readable output format.

prompt.system: You verify that the final output meets quality standards.

params.task: Check if the formatted output is complete and well-structured.
